description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Lamb & Beet Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Lamb & Beet Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread hummus over cooked pizza bases. Top with mince and eggplant slices. Drizzle with tzatziki and finish with beetroot and mint leaves, to serve.
